function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large stocks of vaccine not available for 18 months or more","Impact":"Continued transmission of contagious disease","Mitigation":"Invest in research and development for rapid vaccine production","Technologies":"Biotechnology, gene editing, and advanced manufacturing","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Large uncertainties around transmission of the virus and policy effectiveness","Impact":"Ineffective or inappropriate policies may be implemented","Mitigation":"Invest in ongoing surveillance and research to inform policy decisions","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data analytics, and remote monitoring","People":"Health officials, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions, and government"},{"Description":"Spontaneous adoption of risk-reducing behaviors uncertain","Impact":"Inadequate public adherence to preventive measures","Mitigation":"Implement public awareness campaigns and education programs","Technologies":"Social media, digital communications, and community engagement platforms","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, and community organizations"}]}
